node.detail_zh: 患者為第 #92 宗個案患者、居於將軍澳寶盈花園 4 座 70 歲老婦的媳婦。患者沒有到過北角福慧精舍佛堂，但其同住並於早前確診的奶奶則是佛堂善信，在 1 月下旬及 2 月上旬多次到過佛堂，相信是她傳給媳婦。患者在奶奶周四確診後，已入住隔離營，故此發病後由隔離營轉往醫院。其同住的丈夫和兒子正在接受檢疫。
node.detail_en: The patient is the daughter-in-law of patient no. 92 who also lives with her. The patient has not been to Fook Wai Ching She in Maylun Apartments but her mother-in-law is a believer.  Her mother-in-law went to the buddist preaching hall multiple times during late Jan and early Feb.   It is believed that the patient was infected by her mother-in-law.   The patient was in quarantine area after her mother-in-law was confirmed as positive with coronavirus. Her husband and son who live with her are under quarantine.
node.classification_zh: 可能本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.description_zh: 「福慧精舍」佛堂位於北角美輪大廈，相關患者包括佛堂工作人員及善信。「福慧精舍」是本港第三宗超級傳播事件。福群組患者中，最早病發日期是 2 月 8 日。
groups.description_en: "Fook Wai Ching She" is a Buddhist preaching hall located in Maylun Apartments, North Point. Related infected patients include staff members and followers. This is the third case of super-spreader. The case was first discovered on Feb 8.

node.remarks_zh: 患者為第 92 宗患者的密切接觸者，於 2 月 27 日起入住翠雅山房檢疫中心
node.remarks_en: As a close contact of patient no. 92, she had been transferred to Heritage Lodge quarantine centre since Feb 27.

node.remarks_zh: 與奶奶（第 92 宗患者）同住
患者為兼職收銀員，自 2 月 27 日起沒有上班
node.remarks_en: The patient is a part-time cashier and did not go to work since Feb 27.
